SEARCH
Package KI306.Mytsenko.Lab3

Class OfficeCenter

java.lang.Object
KI306.Mytsenko.Lab3.House
KI306.Mytsenko.Lab3.OfficeCenter
All Implemented Interfaces:
OfficeInterface
public class OfficeCenter extends House implements OfficeInterface
The OfficeCenter class represents an office center, which extends the House abstract class and implements the OfficeFunctionality interface. It adds specific functionality for an office center, including office space allocation and office equipment management.

    • OfficeCenter

      public OfficeCenter(String address, int numberOfFloors, int officeSpace, boolean hasMeetingRoom, int numberOfDesks, boolean hasProjector, boolean hasWhiteboard)
      Constructor for creating an OfficeCenter object with specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      address - The address of the office center.
      numberOfFloors - The number of floors in the office center.
      officeSpace - The amount of office space in square meters.
      hasMeetingRoom - Indicates whether the office center has a meeting room.
      numberOfDesks - The number of desks in the office center.
      hasProjector - Indicates whether the office center has a projector.
      hasWhiteboard - Indicates whether the office center has a whiteboard.
